item.description:
Masacote Fundraising Party AND Official Cruise Vacation Raffle Drawing!


Join us for a night of salsa dancing and the official raffle drawing of a CRUISE VACATION for TWO!!! Invite your family and friends!

PARTY ENTRANCE ONLY $5!!!


Date: Friday, August 17

Time: 8pm-12am

Beginner Salsa Lesson: 8-9pm
Intermediate Salsa Lesson: 8-9pm

Music: DJ Hernan

Performance by Masacote Dance Company!
Official Raffle Drawing!

Entrance: ONLY $5!

Capacity is 350! So get your ticket in advance!



Meanwhile, Raffle tickets will be on sale during the night. Tickets are $5 each, or Buy a pack of 5 for only $20 and multiply your chances! Need not be present to win!

This is an important event in getting Joel Masacote's 2nd album out! All Proceeds will be put toward studio costs for Joel's upcoming Latin Jazz album!



Location: Knights of Columbus; 75 West School St.; Charlestown, MA 02129

T accessible!
(Orange Line - Community College Stop)

> Find Out More!
> Read about the Other Raffle Prizes!!!
> Purchase a Raffle Ticket Today! (Need not be present to win)

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: August 17 Masacote Fundraising Party & Raffle Drawing!
